div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: All Clark-Pleasant Schools will be following Connected Learning from home through May 15th. Grades 5-12 will use Google Classroom while grades K-4 will use learning packets. These learning packets...
Free meals for all students are available for pick up and take-away through May 15th on Mondays and Wednesdays from 9-11 AM at our middle school. Contact jventer@cpcsc.k12.in.us to be added to...
Information regarding the Coronavirus provided by our Health Services Department can be found on our website here...http://www.cpcsc.k12.in.us/o/district/page/coronavirus-info--2

p.br:
Please use ParentVUE or the link below to register your children for the 2020-2021 school year.
There are separate paths for new families and for those with existing children attending our schools.

Nominations accepted through Apr. 30th.
